text: Juan José Méndez Fernandez (born March 27, 1964 in Barcelona) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is a C1 type athlete. He competed at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He was the number three cyclists to finish in the Road Trial LC4 race. He competed at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He was the number two cyclists to finish in the Road Trial LC4 race. He was the number three cyclists to finish in the Individual Pursuit track LC4 race. He competed at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in cycling. == References == == Other websites == * Juan Jose Mendez Fernandez's webpage Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1964 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Juan José Méndez
